nodes.text: Bpfassh 3 was the third moon in the complicated system which orbited the planet Bpfassh. It contained a starfighter base, which was presumably destroyed by the Imperial Star Destroyer Inexorable in 9 ABY.

The moon was not named specifically in the only novel in which it appears. However, the tactical officer aboard the Chimaera reported to Captain Pellaeon that "... fighters [were] launching from the third moon."
